The aunt (another NTR antagonist) is either the brainiac behind this whole operation or is just revenge fucking her nephew. The fact that the MC never gets revenge for the mom NTR performed in the early chapters and in the lore leaves this as a loss. And I still have a problem as to why the Mom brought the MC along for the trip in the first place. (If Mom didn’t know that the Aunt knew what was going on, and the Aunt asked to make sure MC comes, then I guess the Mom did it to not arise suspicion, but it’s never a point that’s actually brought up so we’re just left to assume based on the very limited information presented to us). And
If we’re to believe that the Mom was trying to keep it a secret from both her Son and Sister, then she did a REALLY poor job at it. And for Azrael: if the Cousin “forced himself” on the Mom during the last trip, then I feel like the Mom would have DEFINITELY said something about that in this chapter, seeing as how the secret was out anyway and revealing that would give her an excuse.

I was also wondering if the Mom, after fucking the Cousin, had ever even entertained the idea of doing it with her own Son in the time between visits. I really don’t see a reason as to why She wouldn’t, and as far as I see it, there’s not that big of a difference in Mom/Son Aunt/Nephew, ESPECIALLY when the nephew in question is a goddamn Minor. (note: I don’t have an issue with Loli/Shota stuff, I’m just pointing out that it’s weird for the characters to be talking about the “problem” with incest while ignoring the fact that the Cousin is, like, 12)  —>

Of course, all of this is probably a bigger issue for myself than most others here, because I’m the freak who got weirdly invested in this hentai plot. But personally I was much more interested in learning more about the set up for all of this than seeing the conclusion. For example: If the Mom wasn’t coerced in the moment by the Aunt and Cousin, then does that mean She got interested in the thought and instigated the relationship behind her Sisters back? Or did the Cousin start pursuing her himself (maybe persuaded by his own Mom, but that leads to even more questions) and She (presumably) willingly went along with it? Either way, how could she NOT think that her Sister would know/find out when SHE should have known that the Cousin was already sleeping with his own Mom, and wouldn’t have a reason to not tell his Mom. —>

Long ass rambling comment chain: This ending feels narratively unsatisfying, it was the most obvious conclusion, but the way it plays out feels underwhelming and anti-climactic. I felt like the previous parts had built up a sort of intrigue that would lead to some kind of confrontation between the MC and his Mom, with a “reveal” that would answer a few questions as to how it all happened. But we didn’t get that, we don’t even get any of the MC’s inner thoughts on what’s currently happening. This chapter is barebones and barely has any actual “story” to it, just a lot of generic porn dialogue (I feel like the MC should have straight decked his Cousin when he said “your Mom’s pussy is awesome”). I expected at least some kind of discussion between all of the characters, leading into an explanation, then (potential) apology, to confession, THEN the orgy. —>
